data.text: @CalMatters @Scott_Wiener So child sex traffickers can bring their victims to abortion clinics no questions asked? Good to know

@CalMatters @Scott_Wiener Maybe we should allow them to drink responsibly and smoke cigarettes.  Hell, let 12yo’s drive too while we are at it.  And run for president. Only pedophiles are hellbent on exposing kids to more harm. No more @DrPanMD @Scott_Wiener leave kids alone!!
@CalMatters @Scott_Wiener How many 12 yr olds have you been around? Are you going to give them the right to vote next?
@CalMatters @Scott_Wiener Someone needs to get a members list from NAMBLA
@CalMatters @Scott_Wiener Uh, who is trusting a 12 year old to do all that on their own? No rational responsible parent is, that’s for sure.
@CalMatters @Scott_Wiener This is the same guy who wants to pass a bill making it OK for children under 18 to have sex with mature men.
@CalMatters @Scott_Wiener Who goes around writing legislation for 12 years olds to get abortions in secret? This is absolutely gross.
@CalMatters @Scott_Wiener Whoever allows this should be arrested for child endangerment then dropped in GenPop.
@ch_cbh @CalMatters @Scott_Wiener Unfortunately a majority of Californians don’t pay enough attention to know this is even happening
